Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly exceptional and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and excellence. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $150. I understand that everyone has different budgets, so if this price is a bit out of your current range, please let me know, and we can discuss other options. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the unparalleled quality firsthand. Thank you for considering our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
